LanguageData.TwoTails.label: 两个长尾巴的故事
LanguageData.TwoTails.description: Two Orassian saw in the sky a strange object, which is rapidly falling to the ground, to which they were quick to get in time. The game begins with the moment when two Orassians found the place a spaceship wreck. \n\nYou will play for orassan race.
LanguageData.TwoTails.scenario.name: 两个长尾巴的故事
LanguageData.TwoTails.scenario.summary: Forward to a shipwreck. There may have survived?
LanguageData.TwoTails.scenario.description: Two Orassian saw in the sky a strange object, which is rapidly falling to the ground, to which they were quick to get in time. The game begins with the moment when two Orassians found the place a spaceship wreck. \n\nYou will play for orassan race.
